dict.string: Welcome to the Dev Shop. Your job is to keep this place going, and to keep everyone happy. Spend the budget on needs as they arrive. Be smart, and good luck!
GRUMBLE, GRUMBLE. Hungry developers. Feed us now!
It's been a long day and blood sugars are low. Running a digital sweat shop ain't easy. Head over to the store and keep those engineers happy with some of that yummy Cali goodness!
PRRSSST! Thirsty engineers! We must have beer!
The fridge is empty and the engineers are getting cranky. Time to loosen things up with some cold IPA! You can find some at the store.
When was the last time this office was cleaned? The carpet looks terrible. Head to the store, buy a vacuum, and keep it in your closet!
